stimulusHtml: The rate of change of the altitude of a hot-air balloon is given by r(t) = t3 - 4t2 + 6 for 0 ≤ t ≤ 8. Which of the following expressions gives the change in altitude of the balloon during the time the altitude is decreasing?
choicesHtml: ∫ 1.572 3.514 r ( t ) d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4875@

∫ 0 8 r ( t ) d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42A1@

∫ 0 2.667 r ( t ) d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@458E@

∫ 1.572 3.514 r ′ ( t ) d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4881@

∫ 0 2.667 r ′ ( t ) d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@459A@
